Name: Ultimate Christmas Puzzler 2
About the game: The Ultimate Holiday Puzzle Collection ! Over 150 Christmas Puzzles for All the Family to Enjoy ! Brought to you by Casual Arts, developer of the classic series of Christmas Wonderland Games. The Ultimate Christmas Puzzler is a mega collection of over 150 happy holiday, Christmas themed puzzles! Celebrate the season playing lots of different puzzle types including Jigsaws, Rotates, Flipsaws, Word Searches, Concentration and many more! Play great puzzles featuring Santa Claus, Mrs. Claus and the Elves. Visit the North Pole, Santa’s Workshops. See his Sleigh flying around the World, to the USA and homes in Springfield. There are puzzles for everyone and players of ALL ages and ALL abilities will feel included and love playing them. Play at your own pace. Play alone or with family and friends. The game’s sensational puzzles come in Easy, Medium, Hard & Extreme categories. Casual Arts specialise in making games for everyone to enjoy and The Ultimate Christmas Puzzler is yet another of their great games designed to bring you hour upon hour of fabulous gameplay, time and time again.
